content: the leddy infinity scarf pattern combines a simple 2-row stitch repeat with wide stripes for a meditative project the pattern includes 7 child and adult sizes with a variety of widths and lengths and including standard and infinity scarf options so you re sure to find an option for someone on your handmade holiday list this pattern coordinates with the leddy striped hat 1 > **this
